Cricket Australia has thrown the book at the Brisbane Heat and its two bubble rule-breakers, issuing $70,000 in fines, but have stopped short of issuing suspensions for either player.

articles.author: Chris Barrett
articles.title: Smith training drama adds more chaos to Adelaide build-up - The Age
articles.description: Shaking an arm, star batsman Steve Smith left training at Adelaide Oval after just 10 minutes, and didn't return.
articles.content:
Even so, the development was a concerning one. Smith walked gingerly from the venue, appearing in discomfort as he crossed the ground with teammates on Tuesday night.

articles.title: Former Australian Test cricketer and SANFL footballer Eric 'Fritzy' Freeman dies aged 76 - ABC News
articles.description: Tributes are pouring in for the South Australian who played 11 Tests for Australia and 116 games for Port Adelaide, kicking 390 goals.
articles.content:
Tributes are pouring in for former test cricketer and champion SANFL forward Eric Freeman, who has died aged 76.
